bannerQuote: Fuel your day, the real way.
bannerDescription: Master your meals, workouts, and goals—all from one powerful app.

faq.q1: Is the app free to use?
faq.a1: Yes, our application is completely free for everyone. No charge, no hidden fees.
faq.q2: How can I track my calories and nutrients?
faq.a2: You can use our built-in chatbot to keep track of your calories, macros, and daily nutrition intake with ease.
faq.q3: Does the app support barcode scanning?
faq.a3: Currently, barcode scanning is not supported — but we’re working on exciting updates!
faq.q4: Can I view my body progress over time?
faq.a4: The app can save your weekly body stats including weight, hip, waist, and belly measurements to help you track your journey.
faq.q5: How does the app personalize nutrition recommendations?
faq.a5: We collect basic appearance data like your height, weight, and exercise intensity to calculate your personal TDEE and BMR.
faq.a6: Absolutely. Your health and nutrition data is stored securely and will never be shared without your permission.

about.title: From Meals to Muscle — All in One Place.
about.description: We listen, adapt, and design with precision — turning client insights into powerful digital solutions.

overlay.leftDesc: Got an account? Let's reconnect—log in now!
overlay.rightDesc: Jump into your health journey—just fill in your details to begin.

footer.title: My Fitness Dawg
footer.description: An intuitive website that empowers you to build personalized meal plans, monitor nutrition, and plan healthy meals effortlessly every day.
